metadata.title: CVE-2019-5773 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient origin validation in IndexedDB in Google Chrome prior to72.0.3626.81 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the rendererprocess to bypass same origin policy via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
